Uses of Interface
net.sf.jclal.core.IQueryStrategy

  • Packages that use IQueryStrategy 
    Package Description
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.batchmode
    The package contains the batch mode strategies to use by a scenario and query strategy.
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy
    The package contains the multilabel query strategies.
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.oracle
    The package contains implementations of Oracles.
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy
    The package contains the class that represents an abstract query strategies.
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario
    The package contains the AL scenarios.
    net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy
    The package contains the query strategies for single label data.
    net.sf.jclal.core
    The package contains the core of the framework.

      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> QBestBatchMode.instancesSelection(IQueryStrategy queryStrategy, java.util.List<Container> intanceUtilities)
      Order the instances and return according to the type of query strategy.

    • Uses of IQueryStrategy in net.sf.jclal.activelearning.multilabel.querystrategy

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMultiLabelQueryStrategy
      Abstract class for multi-label query strategies
      class  MultiLabel3DimensionalQueryStrategy
      Implementation of 3Dimensional strategy.
      class  MultiLabelBinMinQueryStrategy
      Implementation of BinMin active strategy.
      class  MultiLabelDensityDiversityQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Density Diversity query strategy for multilabel learning
      class  MultiLabelMaxLossQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Max Loss active strategy.
      class  MultiLabelMeanMaxLossQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Mean Max Loss active strategy.
      class  MultiLabelMMCQueryStrategy
      Implementation of MMC (Maximal loss reduction with maximal confidence) active strategy.

      void SimulatedOracle.labelInstances(IQueryStrategy queryStrategy)
      Do nothing due to the label of the selected instances are known.

    • Uses of IQueryStrategy in net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

      Classes in net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy that implement IQueryStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
      Abstract class for single label query strategies.
      class  DensityDiversityQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Density Diversity query strategy.
      class  EntropySamplingQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Entropy Sampling Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
      class  ErrorReductionQueryStrategy
      Abstract class for Error Reduction family of query strategies.
      class  ExpectedCeroOneLossQueryStrategy
      The objective here is to reduce the expected total number of incorrect predictions.
      class  ExpectedLogLossQueryStrategy
      This class minimizes the expected log-loss, which is equivalent to reducing the expected entropy over unlabeled set.
      class  KullbackLeiblerDivergenceQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Query By Committee query strategy, variant: Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence.
      class  LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Least Confident Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
      class  MarginSamplingQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Margin Sampling Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy.
      class  QueryByCommitte
      Abstract class for query by committee family of query strategies.
      class  RandomSelectionQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Random selection query strategy.
      class  RelevanceSamplingQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Relevance Sampling query strategy.
      class  UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy
      Abstract class for Uncertainty Sampling family of query strategies.
      class  VarianceReductionQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Variance Reduction query strategy.
      class  VoteEntropyQueryStrategy
      Implementation of Query By Committee query strategy, variant: Vote entropy.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
